TopicTitle: Using Dres as an FTL drive

Articles.Content: I went to Dres and found out that the terrain maybe wasn't as solid as I hoped. Well, might as well try to have fun with it.

Scott Manley clipped trough the bottom of the Mohole and exited at 150 km/s. Managed to get this in KSP 1 3 times  looks like this is more common in KSP 2 as I think I experienced it 4 times in KSP 1 and one was not just an part clipping but an craft.
